contact text1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing you, knowing your ideas and constributing to your projects with my work
portfolio text: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.
skills text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
aboutme-hy: Hi, I am a Frontend Developer with hands-on experience in building websites and complex web apps with JavaScript & Angular. I am passionate about translating design into innovative code solutions. Through my skillset and several project experience I am able to realize extensive projects. You are welcome to get an insight into my projects which contains responsive websites and business apps.
aboutme-lightbulb: I built single pages and several web apps, as well as simple business software and OOP-based Jump-and-Run-Games. It is of great importance to me to implement a design exactly with focus on details.
puzzle: Due to my professional experience, I am used to maintaining clear and effective communication, enabling smooth teamwork and efficient workflows.
pokedex description: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
join description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
locco description: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the big hen.
rof description: A well-known and simple card game based on Angular. Through Firebase you can even play with friends over the Internet.
